title: Key Benefits for Hackers
text: The Cyberbay Platform is built with key tools that incentivize and optimize workflows across bug bounty programs.

features.title: Cyberbay Lighthouse
features.text: Access a dedicated enterprise digital platform, find bugs, and communicate with organizations via the Cyberbay Lighthouse technology system. The platform is integrated with VPN, proxy, and data analytics to help you focus on bug hunting.

features.title: Bid-Ask Mechanism
features.text: Our interactive bid-ask mechanism allows you to negotiate bounty amounts with organizations based on skill set, certifications, scope, and urgency.
